item.title: Improving Build Time of Java Builds on OpenShift
item.description: As you might know, OpenShift 3 Enterprise provides Middleware Services (xPaas), which is a set of Java based images for JBoss EAP, JBoss EWS (Tomcat), JBoss Fuse Integration Services, JBoss A-MQ, JBoss Decision Server and JBoss Data Grid. Also, OpenShift Origin provides an additional JBoss based images for Wildfly, our application server community project. All these images are source-to-image (S2I) enable, that means that will get your application source code built (using Maven) and layered into the application container.
item.dc:creator: jorgemoralespou
